name: 3d Track Race Mania
description:
3D Track Racer Mania - a race in which you have to show skill of driving that would take first place. Have time to pass the race in the allotted time, which would have to earn money to buy new machines. Drift - earn as many points that would win.
Features:
- Realistic cars;
- Different trails for the race;
- Game mode for a while;
- Play mode with bots;
- Play mode drift;
- Realistic behavior of vehicles;
- Many different cars to choose from;
- 3 modes of play;
Gameplay:
- Touch screen multi-touch controls;
- Management of the accelerometer;
- Take the first place, that would get the prize;
